manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description Package includes 1. MINI HD U-BOX RETRO game console (including game TF card,Including 10000+classic games) 2. Two wireless game controllers（without battery） 3. USB Power cord 4. User Manual

Detailed instructions for game console 1. Please use 5V/1A or higher power adapter (such as mobile phone charger/USB interface on TV, etc.) to power the retro game console. 2. Connect the game console to the HD port of the TV. 3. The TV signal source is adjusted to the HD channel to display the game list screen on the TV. Plug and play game console, no need to set, the controller automatically connects to the nostalgic game console. 4. Put 2 AAA batteries into the controller. When the controller switch points to 1P, the controller is the master controller. (used when selecting games and playing single-player games) When the power-on point is 2P, this controller is a sub-controller (used when playing two-player games) 5. Exit the game: (P1 controller) Press SECECT+START for two seconds at the same time. You can exit the game/save the game. Press SECECT again to return to the main menu of the game

The wireless controller needs to add 2 new AAA batteries Please put two new or fully charged AAA batteries into the wireless controller so that the game console can work normally. If the power of the wireless game controller is low, the controller will restart/get stuck/lag/freeze. Powered by 5V/1A charger Please use 5V/1A or higher power adapter (such as mobile phone charger/USB interface on TV) to power the game console. Set the TV input mode to HD input Use the TV remote control to adjust the TV to the corresponding HD channel, and the game menu will appear on the screen.

Controller 1P/2P switch switching When the switch points to 1P, this controller is the master controller.(used when selecting games and playing single-player games) When the power-on point is 2P, this controller is a sub-controller (used when playing two-player games) Exit the game: (controller P1) Press SECECT+START for two seconds at the same time. Then press the SECECT key to return to the main menu.

User Floder Menu You can add more favorite games in the User Floder directory. Vintage handheld game consoles not only bring children interesting game time, but also awaken the happy childhood memories of adults in the 1980s and 1990s. The best choice to relax at home, travel and hotel.

Notice: When the power of the wireless game controller is low, the retro game console will make you automatically return to the menu, delay or freeze the controller, etc. When the classic game console cannot work properly, please replace it with a new and fully charged battery. Please install fully charged BATTERIES for the controller WHEN: Click any keys it returns to the main menu. Controller keys sometimes do not work. The controller does not work after playing for a period of time. It started well and stopped working after a few days. Color:Black Game Type: Action games: 88 types, including Super Mario , Dr. Mario Shooting games: 94 kinds, including Contra 24in1, Super Contra Sports games: 43 types, including passionate basketball and golf Fighting games: 46 types, including Turtle 1/2/3, Street Fighter Racing games: 25 types, including F1 races and fierce battles Puzzle games: 325 kinds, including Tetris, Pac-Man, Tank How To Use 1. Connect the game console to the HD port of the TV, connect the USB-powered data cable to the host, and then adjust the TV signal source to the HD channel to display the game list screen on the TV. 2. Put 2 AAA batteries into the game controller, and use controller 1 to control the game console for the first time. 3. Quit the game: （ no.1 handle）Press SECECT + START at the same time for two seconds. Package includes 1. MINI HD U-BOX game console (including game TF card) 2. Two wireless game controllers（without battery） 3. USB Power cord 4. User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Tons of retro games

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: As a child of the 80s, I had to purchase this for myself—so fun! After playing it three or four times, it stopped working. I was trouble-shooting the issue only to discover that the dongle had melted completely. (See photo).Sadly, the seller does not replace items so I had to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HDMI NINTENDO GAME AND WIRELESS CONTROLLERS
reviews.reviewText: The system is great and it has a great picture quality. The controllers are lacking because if u press a direction it gets stuck in that direction. So say your playing Super Mario Bros and you press right to walk or run u will keep walking in that direction without your fingers pressing on the directional pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of good games
reviews.reviewText: Controls are cheap, one mine already stopped working. Other than that it was great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's OK, but Worth It
reviews.reviewText: I grew up playing 8 bit games. It was such a joy seeing all the games there were, ones I played and a LOT I never knew about. Problem is the direction key did stick, which REALLY caused a problem when I played Legend Of Zelda. Also it died on me after few weeks (yes I was able to return it).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great value , great games , can’t beat the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun in a tiny box
reviews.reviewText: Fun video for those of us that grew up in the 80s!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
